bibl.title: Some Remarks on the Christian Symbol ΧΜΓ.
bibl.note: The purpose of the present paper is to draw attention to some new evidence rather than to give a final interpretation. It is possible that the meaning of ΧΜΓ varied at times.
bibl.seg: DERDA Tomasz, Some Remarks on the Christian Symbol ΧΜΓ.
The purpose of the present paper is to draw attention to some new evidence rather than to give a final interpretation. It is possible that the meaning of ΧΜΓ varied at times.
